document_data.name: Grayvale Run
document_data.mainbody: The '''Grayvale Run''' was a stretch of trail that ran through the [[Grayvale]], in the southern stretch of the [[Savage Frontier]]. It connected the city of [[Loudwater]] to nearby [[Llorkh]].
document_data.History: In the years following the disestablishment of the [[Ordning (social structure)|Ordning]] among the [[giant]]s, after [[1485 DR]], the structures and buildings around the Grayvale bore the destructive wrath of the nearby [[stone giant]]s.
